Hey there, I am Andrés

a digital age alchemist in his never ending quest for the perfect mix of art and code.

About myself

I'm a 3d Artist and self-taught coder with a profound passion for the Japanese language and culture. I'm also a Free Software advocate as well as a GNU/Linux user.

When I am not working on one of my concoctions, I like to indulge myself in my love for the Japanese language as the sole creator and maintainer of Niponismo, an Anki deck aimed to help Spanish native speakers learn Japanese in their own languange.

These are some of the tools I use the most

  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Sass
  • JavaScript
  • JQuery
  • Node
  • Gulp
  • Git
  • Shell
  • Python
  • Django
  • Nginx
